trans-unit.source: Represents a wrapper class for handle resources.
trans-unit.target: 代表控制代碼資源的包裝函式類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> class is similar to the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle> class, except that <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle> implements reference counting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>類別是類似於<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle>類別，但是<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle>實作參考計數。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> instead of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle> to address performance considerations when you can provide the necessary synchronization more efficiently yourself.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>而不是<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle>位址效能考量，當多個提供所需的同步處理時至有效率地使用您自己。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> class does not perform reference counting, it does not provide protection from handle recycling security attacks.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>類別不會執行參考計數，但是它不提供從回收安全性攻擊的控制代碼的保護。

trans-unit.source: Because the reference counting algorithm implicitly serializes operations, a certain amount of thread safety is also lost.
trans-unit.target: 參考計數演算法會以隱含方式序列化作業，因為安全執行緒數量也會遺失。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle.Close%2A> method while an operation that is using the handle is outstanding on another thread, or if you call <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle.Close%2A> from two threads at the same time, the results are non-deterministic.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle.Close%2A>方法使用控制代碼的作業，另一個執行緒上未執行時，或您呼叫<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle.Close%2A>從在同一時間的兩個執行緒，則結果為不具決定性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> class still provides the guaranteed critical finalization provided by the <xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.CriticalFinalizerObject> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>類別仍然會提供所提供的保證關鍵結束<xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.CriticalFinalizerObject>類別。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for inheritors.
trans-unit.target: 針對繼承者完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法繼承由部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The value of an invalid handle (usually 0 or -1).
trans-unit.target: 無效控制代碼的值 (通常是 0 或 -1)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle" /> class with the specified invalid handle value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的無效控制代碼值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The derived class resides in an assembly without unmanaged code access permission.
trans-unit.target: 衍生類別位於沒有 Unmanaged 程式碼存取權限的組件中。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for inheritors.
trans-unit.target: 針對繼承者完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法繼承由部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Marks the handle for releasing and freeing resources.
trans-unit.target: 標記要釋出和釋放資源的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A> or <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A> method allows the resources to be freed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A>或<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A>方法可讓要釋放資源。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle> class, this will always happen immediately since there is no reference count to indicate that other threads are using this handle.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle>類別，這一律會發生立即因為沒有參考計數，以指出其他執行緒正在使用此控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must employ a synchronization mechanism to ensure it is safe to call the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須採用同步處理機制，以確保其安全地呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Although most classes that use the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> class do not need to provide a finalizer, this is sometimes necessary (for example, to flush out file buffers or to write some data back into memory).
trans-unit.target: 雖然大部分的類別使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>類別不需要提供完成項，這有時是必要 （例如，清除檔案緩衝區，或者撰寫一些資料放回記憶體）。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the class can provide a finalizer that is guaranteed to run before the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> critical finalizer runs.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，類別可以提供一定會先執行完成項<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>重要的完成項執行。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A> or <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A> method when you are finished using the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> object.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A>或<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A>方法，當您完成使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> object in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A>方法會使<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>中無法使用的狀態物件。

trans-unit.source: **Note** Always call <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A> or <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> object.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**永遠呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A>或<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A>您釋放最後一個參考之前<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>物件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> object's <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> 物件的 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Finalize%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Marks the handle for releasing and freeing resources.
trans-unit.target: 標記要釋出和釋放資源的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle" /> 所使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A> or <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A> method allows the resources to be freed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A>或<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A>方法可讓要釋放資源。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle> class, this will always happen immediately since there is no reference count to indicate that other threads are using this handle.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle>類別，這一律會發生立即因為沒有參考計數，以指出其他執行緒正在使用此控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must employ a synchronization mechanism to ensure it is safe to call the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須採用同步處理機制，以確保其安全地呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Although most classes that use the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> class do not need to provide a finalizer, this is sometimes necessary (for example, to flush out file buffers or to write some data back into memory).
trans-unit.target: 雖然大部分的類別使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>類別不需要提供完成項，這有時是必要 （例如，清除檔案緩衝區，或者撰寫一些資料放回記憶體）。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the class can provide a finalizer that is guaranteed to run before the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> critical finalizer runs.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，類別可以提供一定會先執行完成項<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>重要的完成項執行。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A> or <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A> method when you are finished using the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> object.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A>或<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A>方法，當您完成使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> object in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A>方法會使<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>中無法使用的狀態物件。

trans-unit.source: **Note** Always call the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A> or <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A> method before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> object.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**永遠呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A>或<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A>方法之前您釋放最後一個參考<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>物件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> object's <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> 物件的 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Finalize%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> for a normal dispose operation; <see langword="false" /> to finalize the handle.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示一般處置作業，而 <see langword="false" /> 則表示完成控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle" /> class specifying whether to perform a normal dispose operation.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle" /> 類別所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，指定是否要執行一般處置作業。

trans-unit.source: You should never explicitly call the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A> method with the `disposing` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您應該永遠不會明確地呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A>方法`disposing`參數設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: Frees all resources associated with the handle.
trans-unit.target: 釋放與控制代碼相關的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Finalize%2A> method is the destructor for the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Finalize%2A>方法是解構函式<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>類別。

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式程式碼不應該直接呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the handle to be wrapped.
trans-unit.target: 指定要包裝的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Do not expose the handle publicly (that is, outside of the derived class).
trans-unit.target: 公開不公開控制代碼 (也就是說，衍生的類別之外)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the handle is closed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制代碼是否已關閉。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handle is closed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制代碼已關閉，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsClosed%2A> method returns a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> object's handle is no longer associated with a native resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsClosed%2A>方法傳回值，指出是否<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>物件的控制代碼不再與原生資源相關聯。

trans-unit.source: This differs from the definition of the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsInvalid%2A> property, which computes whether a given handle is always considered invalid.
trans-unit.target: 這不同於的定義<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsInvalid%2A>屬性，計算是否一律視為指定的控制代碼無效。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsClosed%2A> method returns a `true` value in the following cases:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsClosed%2A>方法會傳回`true`值在下列情況：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.SetHandleAsInvalid%2A> method was called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.SetHandleAsInvalid%2A>呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A> method or <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A> method was called and there are no references to the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> object on other threads.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A>方法或<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A>而呼叫方法，且沒有參考至<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>其他執行緒上的物件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the handle value is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得值以指出這個控制代碼值是否無效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handle is valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制代碼有效則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes must implement the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsInvalid%2A> property so that the common language runtime can determine whether critical finalization is required.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別必須實作<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsInvalid%2A>屬性，以便決定是否需要重大的最終處理，通用語言執行平台。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes must provide an implementation that suits the general type of handle they support (0 or -1 is invalid).
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別必須提供符合它們支援的控制代碼的一般類型的實作 （0 或-1 無效）。

trans-unit.source: These classes can then be further derived for specific safe handle types.
trans-unit.target: 這些類別可以再進一步衍生特定的安全控制代碼類型。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsClosed%2A> property, which reports whether the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> object has finished using the underlying handle, the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsInvalid%2A> property calculates whether the given handle value is always considered invalid.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsClosed%2A>屬性，報告是否<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>物件已經完成使用基礎控制代碼，<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsInvalid%2A>屬性計算是否一律視為指定的控制代碼值無效。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsInvalid%2A> property always returns the same value for any one handle value.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsInvalid%2A>屬性一律會傳回相同值的任何一個控制代碼值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, executes the code required to free the handle.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，執行釋放控制代碼所需的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handle is released successfully; otherwise, in the event of a catastrophic failure, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功釋放控制代碼，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果發生嚴重失敗的事件，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, it generates a [releaseHandleFailed](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/releasehandlefailed-mda.md) Managed Debugging Assistant.
trans-unit.target: 在這種情況下，它會產生 [releaseHandleFailed](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/releasehandlefailed-mda.md) Managed 偵錯助理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.ReleaseHandle%2A> method is guaranteed to be called only once, provided that you employ proper synchronization mechanisms to ensure that only one call to the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A> or <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A> method is made.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.ReleaseHandle%2A>方法保證僅一次，前提是您採用適當的同步處理機制，以確保只有一個呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Close%2A>或<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.Dispose%2A>方法進行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.ReleaseHandle%2A> method will not be called if the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsInvalid%2A> or <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsClosed%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.ReleaseHandle%2A>將不會呼叫方法，如果<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsInvalid%2A>或<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.IsClosed%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method in your <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> derived classes to execute any code that is required to free the handle.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法在您<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>衍生類別，執行釋放控制代碼所需的任何程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Because one of the functions of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle> is to guarantee prevention of resource leaks, the code in your implementation of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.ReleaseHandle%2A> must never fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為其中一個函式的<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle>是保證的資源流失，您的實作中的程式碼防護<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.ReleaseHandle%2A>必須永遠不會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector calls <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.ReleaseHandle%2A> after normal finalizers have been run for objects that were garbage collected at the same time, and guarantees the resources to invoke it and that it will not be interrupted while it is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.ReleaseHandle%2A>之後正常完成項已執行之物件的同時，回收，並且正在進行中的資源，以叫用和，它將不會中斷，而它的保證。

trans-unit.source: This method will be prepared as a constrained execution region (CER) at instance construction time (along with all the methods in its statically determinable call graph).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在執行個體 （以及它以靜態方式判斷呼叫歷程圖中的方法） 的建構階段準備做為限制的執行區域 (CER)。

trans-unit.source: Although this prevents thread abort interrupts, you must still be careful not to introduce any fault paths in your overridden <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.ReleaseHandle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這會防止執行緒中止插斷，但您仍然必須小心，不要導入任何錯誤路徑，在您覆寫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.ReleaseHandle%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In particular, apply the <xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.ReliabilityContractAttribute> attribute to any methods you call from <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.ReleaseHandle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，套用<xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.ReliabilityContractAttribute>屬性設定為您從呼叫任何方法<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.ReleaseHandle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: In most cases this code should be:
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下應使用此程式碼：

trans-unit.source: Additionally, for simple cleanup (for example, calling the Win32 API `CloseHandle` on a file handle) you can check the return value for the single platform invoke call.
trans-unit.target: 此外，對於簡單的清除 (例如，呼叫 Win32 API`CloseHandle`上的檔案控制代碼) 為單一平台叫用呼叫，您可以檢查傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: For complex cleanup, you may have a lot of program logic and many method calls, some of which might fail.
trans-unit.target: 複雜的清除，您可能使用大量的程式邏輯和多個方法呼叫，其中有些可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: You must ensure that your program logic has fallback code for each of those cases.
trans-unit.target: 您必須確定您的程式邏輯具有回溯程式碼，針對每個這種情況。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.ReleaseHandle%2A> method returns `false` for any reason, it generates a [releaseHandleFailed](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/releasehandlefailed-mda.md) Managed Debugging Assistant.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.ReleaseHandle%2A>方法會傳回`false`基於任何理由，它會產生[releaseHandleFailed](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/releasehandlefailed-mda.md) Managed 偵錯助理。

trans-unit.source: The pre-existing handle to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的既有控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Sets the handle to the specified pre-existing handle.
trans-unit.target: 將控制代碼設定為指定的既有控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.SetHandle%2A> method only if you need to support a pre-existing handle (for example, if the handle is returned in a structure) because the .NET Framework COM interop infrastructure does not support marshaling handles in a structure.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.SetHandle%2A>方法，您需要支援既有控制代碼 （例如，如果在結構中傳回的控制代碼） 因為.NET Framework COM interop 的基礎結構不支援封送處理時，才會處理結構中。

trans-unit.source: Marks a handle as invalid.
trans-unit.target: 將控制代碼標示為無效。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.SetHandleAsInvalid%2A> method only when you know that your handle is invalid and you want to mark it as such.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.SetHandleAsInvalid%2A>方法只有在您知道您的控制代碼無效，而且想要將它標示為時。

trans-unit.source: Doing so does not change the value of the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.handle> field; it only marks the handle as invalid.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，不會變更的值<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.handle>欄位; 它只會將標示為無效的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The handle might then contain a potentially stale value.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼，則可能會包含過時的值。

trans-unit.source: The effect of this call is that no attempt is made to free the resources.
trans-unit.target: 這個呼叫的效果是，不會嘗試釋放資源。

trans-unit.source: As with the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.SetHandle%2A> method, use <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.SetHandleAsInvalid%2A> only if you need to support a pre-existing handle.
trans-unit.target: 如同<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.SetHandle%2A>方法，請使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CriticalHandle.SetHandleAsInvalid%2A>只有當您需要支援既有控制代碼。
